overview:
Anne Hunt Cheevers is the General Manager of 6FigureJobs.com, the world’s first, and leading, online job board putting together $100k+ job opportunities with $100k+ job seekers.

Anne joined 6FigureJobs.com in 2010 after joining as a candidate member in 2004. As a former member she had a vision for 6FigureJobs’ next phase of growth and has begun that process. After 6 short months job postings and candidate memberships have increased – in both quality and quantity – and member communications are timely, informative and high quality.

With a membership base of well over half a million, 6FigureJobs.com is firmly committed to top quality candidates, for top flight opportunities, with no communication barriers between the two.

6FigureJobs.com wins accolades from candidates and the recruiting industry alike, including Forbes’ Best of the Web for each of the past 7 years and the Weddle’s Top 100 Website Award every year since 2006.

Prior to joining 6FigureJobs.com Anne was a marketer and product developer at consumer and business-to-business publishing companies where she managed and created such periodicals as Career Confidential, Working Smart, and Executive Strategies. Anne was also the editorial director for “Creating and Motivating a Superior Loyal Staff”. Her passion has always been for the business of people: finding great ones, nurturing future stars, challenging and rewarding them for jobs superbly done.
